title: Commentary in OK Economic Report: The case for entitlement reform (Tom Cole)
text: ( Source : Tom Cole ) Oklahoma Economic Report - Congressman Tom Cole Perhaps the most daunting issue that we face as Americans is the massive amount of public debt that exists and the rate at which it is growing. Certainly, the staggering
